description.value: At 15th level, you gain the ability to travel across the battlefield by literally erupting from the fatal wounds of deceased creatures. As a standard action once per day, you can teleport to an unoccupied square adjacent to any dead creature within 10 feet per caster level. Any creatures adjacent to the square you teleport to take 4d6 points of acid damage as you burst into being and shower them with acidic bile. Creatures that make successful Reflex saves (DC 10 + 1/2 your sorcerer level + your Charisma modifier) take half damage. This ability otherwise functions like @Compendium[pf1.spells.ojwg1ki98tq8xyh9]{Dimension Door}. At 20th level, you can use this ability twice per day.
